message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about $12,750? I think we can make a deal at this price.
